main.title: Welcome to Monster Hunter Task Randomizer (MHTR)!

description.title: What is MHTR?
description.text1: MHTR is a tool that helps you to get random tasks for Monster Hunter. These tasks can be used to make the game more interesting, find something to do or to challenge yourself.
description.text2: Task can be anything from 'Hunt a Rathalos' to 'Hunt a Elder Dragon with a Great Sword without using Items'. Tasks can be generated for up to 4 Players at once.
description.text3: What is part of the tasks is up to you. You can choose to only generate a monster to hunt or to add additional conditions like weapon restrictions or additional challenges.
description.text4: Now just select which game you're playing and how many players are in your group and you're ready to go!

player-popup.title: Select Number of Players
player-popup.description: Between 1 and 4 players. The Count can be changed later.
